about_the_game:
What is Project D20?

Project D20 is a campaign visualizer to play your favorite campaigns.

What are Major Updates coming to this game?

Project D20 will have Four Major updates, these updates will add upon new assets, new levels, and new music. Each update will include a new campaign.


The Second Campaign will be released on December 2022, The Vallen.

Do you guys have a discord?

What Game Mechanics are going to be at launch?

  • Dice Roller
  • Build Menu
  • Time of Day Slider
  • Weather System
  • Level Selector
  • Music Selector
  • Notes
  • Campaign's
  • Character Sheet Creator
  • Steam Workshop

We will also add more game mechanics! Every major update!

What Maps are going to be available at launch?


Prefix for our Levels are classified in two different terms, Pre and Open
Open have 4x4Km Maps Open maps for players to use and add.
Pre has an adjusted size to play through the first campaign.


  • Open_DDH
  • Open_Sand
  • Open_Forest
  • Open_Frozen
  • Open_DT
  • Open_Sol
  • Pre_Fallen
  • Pre_Village
  • Pre_Heiksland
  • Pre_Mitsu
    and More!
This list will change ongoing to May 2022, as it might include more or less.

Weather selector?

Yes, a weather system, from foggy to rain and even in the snow.

Toon Style

We know players would love a toon style, ours is inspired by Valheim. So at launch for free players will get the Toon Style, and will be added with extra maps. You can read more about it here, .

content_descriptors.notes:
There will be blood splatter on the ground and sword fighting.
There will be images of undead people and such.

short_description: Project D20 is a FREE TO PLAY campaign visualizer to play your favorite campaigns. Join with your fellow warriors and embark a new adventure where you can go anywhere and play the way you want. May the adventure never end!
